results.title: Coenzyme Q10 levels are low and may be associated with the inflammatory cascade in septic shock
results.text_hl: We measured @CHEMICAL_coenzyme_Q10 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C024989 @@@CoQ10@@@ levels in @<m>DISEASE_Shock_Septic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012772 @@@septic shock@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ enrolled in a randomized trial of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ versus placebo.

results.title: Simvastatin decreases nitric oxide overproduction and reverts the impaired vascular responsiveness induced by endotoxic shock in rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ decreases @CHEMICAL_Nitric_Oxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009569 @@@nitric oxide@@@ overproduction and reverts the impaired vascular responsiveness induced by @<m>DISEASE_Shock_Septic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012772 @@@endotoxic shock@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin and a Plant Galactolipid Protect Animals from Septic Shock by Regulating Oxylipin Mediator Dynamics through the MAPK-cPLA2 Signaling Pathway.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and a Plant @CHEMICAL_Galactolipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D038983 @@@Galactolipid@@@ Protect Animals from @<m>DISEASE_Shock_Septic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012772 @@@Septic Shock@@@ by Regulating @CHEMICAL_Oxylipins @CHEMICAL_MESH:D054883 @@@Oxylipin@@@ Mediator Dynamics through the MAPK-@GENE_PLA2G4A @GENE_18783 @@@cPLA2@@@ Signaling Pathway.
